text: The following list of Swiss football champions lists all past winners of the top-tier football competitions for clubs in Switzerland. It includes all winners of the present-day Swiss Super League as well as the predecessor leagues played in the country. Swiss champions have been officially determined since the 1898–1899 season.Switzerland - List of Champions ;Key {| class="wikitable" |- |style="background-color:#FFFACD"|† |League champions also won
